text: Hi, HubSpot team! Do you have any updates regarding the <https://HubSpot.devpost.com/details/schedule|themes Hackathon>? Semi-finalists were supposed to be announced on the 28th of February. I haven’t seen any updates neither on Devpost nor via email.

<https://HubSpot.devpost.com/updates/21662-update-to-semi-finalist-listings>
> Due to unforeseen circumstances, we will be publishing a single update with the finalists on March 8th. We appreciate everyone’s understanding.
